EmailTemplate.name: Help Desk CS News Template HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Automated Email (Do Not Reply) - Help Desk Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for reaching out to Green Street’s Customer Success team. You’ve reached us over the weekend and as a result response times will be delayed.
We appreciate your patience and look forward to connecting soon.
Best, Green Street
Please do not reply to this email as inbound messages are not monitored by Green Street.
